```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

##檢查
```{r}
#ggplot2 can only accept dataframe
class(iris)
#See the str of iris
str(iris)
```

##單變數：類別型
```{r}
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Species)) + geom_bar(fill = "lightblue", colour = "black")

```

##單變數：連續型
```{r}
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Petal.Length )) + geom_histogram()
```

##雙變數：連續 vs 連續
```{r}
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Petal.Length, y= Petal.Width)) + geom_point()
```

##雙變數：離散 vs 連續
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x= Species, y= Petal.Width)) + geom_boxplot()
```

##多變量：
```{r}
library("GGally")
ggpairs(iris)
```
